nexusDescription: Context Nexus is a professional, in-editor C++ plugin that acts as an expert pair programmer for Unreal developers. It solves the critical problem of context repetition by performing a deep analysis of a project's C++ and Blueprint source code, allowing developers to ask complex questions to an AI that has a perfect, minimal, and relevant understanding of their work.
nexusFeatureFull1: Developed and enhanced the core C++ analysis engine, enabling the tool to parse and understand a project's entire C++ source code.
nexusFeatureFull2: Architected and implemented key UI components using the Slate UI framework, including the 'Project Explorer' and the integrated AI chat panel.
nexusFeatureFull3: Resolved critical C++ compilation, linker errors, and memory corruption bugs to ensure plugin stability and reliability.
nexusFeatureFull4: Integrated the plugin directly into the Unreal Editor's Content Browser, creating a seamless workflow for developers.
nexusFeatureFull5: Enhanced the AI's understanding by implementing semantic analysis of Blueprint graphs and a custom Domain-Specific Language (DSL).
pharmacySubtitle: Modern Android App for On-Duty Pharmacies
pharmacyDescription: A native Android application designed to solve the critical problem of finding on-duty pharmacies in Greece. Built entirely from scratch with a modern tech stack including Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, and Firebase, it offers a clean, performant, and user-centric experience.
pharmacyFeature1: UI Development: Architected a fully declarative and reactive UI using Jetpack Compose, resulting in a modern, intuitive, and maintainable user interface without a single line of XML.
pharmacyFeature2: Software Architecture: Implemented a robust MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel) architecture combined with Kotlin Coroutines and Flow, creating a clear separation of concerns that makes the codebase scalable, stable, and easy to test.
pharmacyFeature3: Backend & Real-time Data: Integrated Firebase Authentication for a complete and secure user management system and utilized Cloud Firestore for its real-time capabilities, ensuring pharmacy status and user favorites are always perfectly synchronized.
pharmacyFeature4: Localization: Engineered end-to-end multilingual support for both English and Greek, allowing users to switch languages dynamically for a fully native experience.
pharmacyFeature5: User Experience: Designed a seamless light/dark mode theme and integrated OpenStreetMap (OSM) for an effective, no-cost mapping solution, complete with dynamic filters for radius search and on-duty status.
